Mangalore Guy Steals Bus, Drives It All The Way To Udupi Before Being Stopped By Cops

In a bizarre incident, a guy from Mangalore decided to steal a private bus parked on the side of the road at a place called Ullal and drove it all the way to Udupi.

According to TOI, the youth was later found to be mentally unstable and he took the bus that shuttles from Ullal to Mangalore, from the bus stop.

Facebook/Picture For Representation

Report state that the drivers generally keep the ignition key of the bus under the driver's seat as the cleaner of the bus requires the same to clean it in the morning.

When the cleaner came in the morning, he was shocked to see the bus missing, reports TOI.

The owner of the bus called up his friends in Udupi and the bus was stopped at Santhekatte by the police. Police traced the bus after being alerted by his father that he was driving all the way to Udupi.

Reports state that man actually called his father while driving the bus saying he was going to visit a holy shrine.

As of now the police have taken him to custody but no case has been filed against him for his mental condition.
